courseName: Advertising in the New Media Era: Contemporary Issues and Practices
notes: This course considers how “new media” formations including Internet, streaming, mobile, social, and user-generated media have altered the advertising industry and advertising practices. Topics may include: advertising’s structural influence over new media technologies and platforms, new media audiences/users/influencers, guerrilla marketing, advertising strategy, regulation and policy. Students will learn advertising skills and techniques required to propose, plan, and execute campaigns in the new/social media environment.
